Define Model
host:
sklearn
function:
GridSearchCV
parameters:
estimator = ‘@estimator’
param_grid = {}
scoring = None
kernel = ‘rbf’
fit_params = None
n_jobs = 1
pre_dispatch = ‘2*n_jobs’
iid = True
cv = None
refit = True
verbose = 0
error_score = ‘raise’
return_train_score = True
send tokens:
best_estimator_ sklearn estimator
best_estimator_ attribute in the GridSearchCV function from sklearn: find it here
cv_results_ pandas data frame
cv_results_ attribute in the GridSearchCV function from sklearn: find it here
api The interface for GridSearchCV function from sklearn
receive tokens:
dfx pandas data frame, shape(n_samples, n_features), requied
feature values matrix
dfy pandas data frame, shape(n_samples,), requied
target values matrix
estimator sklearn estimator, required
will be passed to the ‘estimator’ parameter

 sklearn.model_selection.GridSearchCV: find it here
